What does CRM mean?: CRM stands for Customer Relationship Management. It is a system that helps businesses manage customer data, interactions, and relationships effectively.
What are the main features of a CRM?: Common features include contact management, lead tracking, sales pipeline management, task automation, reporting, and integrations with other tools.
What are the benefits of using a CRM?: A CRM improves customer relationships, boosts sales, saves time with automation, and centralizes all customer information in one place.
Is CRM useful for small businesses?: Yes. Small businesses can use CRM to organize leads, track sales, and improve customer engagement without needing complex systems.
How is CRM better than Excel?: Unlike Excel, a CRM offers automation, real-time collaboration, analytics, and integrations that make managing customers easier and more scalable.
Why is CRM important?: CRM is important because it keeps all customer data organized, helps track sales opportunities, and provides insights for business growth.
Can you give examples of CRM software?: Yes. Popular CRM software includes Salesforce, HubSpot, Zoho CRM, and Pipedrive.
What is CRM automation?: CRM automation refers to automating tasks like sending follow-up emails, assigning leads, creating reminders, and updating records.
What is CRM analytics?: CRM analytics provide insights into sales performance, customer behavior, and pipeline health using reports and dashboards.
What is CRM integration?: CRM integration allows you to connect with tools like Gmail, Outlook, Slack, marketing platforms, and Zapier to streamline workflows.
How do I create a new sales pipeline?: Go to Settings -> Pipelines -> Create New Pipeline. Add stages and name them according to your sales process.
Can I set role-based access for my team?: Yes. Navigate to Settings -> Users & Roles. Assign roles and permissions to control access levels for each user.
How do I track email opens and clicks?: Enable email tracking under Settings -> Email Preferences. Once enabled, you can view opens and clicks in the Email Activity log.
Can I schedule automatic follow-up email: Yes. Go to Automation -> Workflows -> Create New Workflow. Set a trigger and choose 'Send Email' as the action.
How do I view my team's performance repo: Navigate to Reports -> Team Performance. You can view metrics such as deals closed, revenue generated, and tasks completed.
Can I integrate WhatsApp with the CRM?: Yes. Go to Settings -> Integrations -> WhatsApp. Connect your WhatsApp Business account to start sending and receiving messages.
How do I set up lead scoring rules?: Go to Settings -> Lead Scoring. Define rules based on contact behavior, activity, or demographics to assign scores automatically.
Can I bulk update multiple contacts at o: Yes. Go to Contacts -> Select Multiple -> Bulk Actions. Choose 'Update' and edit the required fields for all selected contacts.
How do I archive old deals?: Open the deal and select 'Archive' from the options menu. Archived deals are stored in the Archived tab and can be restored anytime.
Can I create custom dashboards for my te: Yes. Go to Dashboard -> Create New Dashboard. Add widgets and reports to customize the view for your team.
How do I set targets or quotas for sales: Navigate to Settings -> Goals & Quotas. Assign targets to each sales rep and track progress in the reports section.
Can I assign leads automatically based o: Yes. Set up lead assignment rules under Settings -> Automation -> Lead Assignment. Add conditions like location to auto-assign leads.
How do I track customer support tickets?: Go to Support -> Tickets. You can view, assign, and update the status of all customer support requests.
Can I sync my calendar with the CRM?: Yes. Navigate to Settings -> Integrations -> Calendar and connect your Google or Outlook calendar for two-way sync.
How do I set up email templates?: Go to Settings > Email Templates -> Create New. Design your template and save it for future use in campaigns or tasks.
Can I track revenue by region or product: Yes. Go to Reports -> Revenue Analytics and filter results by region, product, or sales rep.
How do I create a custom report?: Navigate to Reports -> Custom Reports -> Create New. Select data sources, filters, and fields to generate your own report.
Can I restrict users from deleting recor: Yes. Go to Settings -> Roles & Permissions. Edit the role and disable the 'Delete' permission for records.
How do I enable single sign-on (SSO)?: Go to Settings > Security -> Single Sign-On. Follow the steps to connect your identity provider and enable SSO for your team.
Can I integrate with QuickBooks or other: Yes. Navigate to Settings -> Integrations -> Accounting. Connect QuickBooks or other supported accounting tools to sync financial data.
How do I merge duplicate contacts?: Go to Contacts -> Find Duplicates. Select the records you want to merge and choose the primary record to keep.
Can I set automatic lead assignment by i: Yes. Go to Settings -> Automation -> Lead Assignment Rules and configure rules based on industry or other fields.
How do I log phone calls in the CRM?: Open a contact or deal, click 'Log Activity', and select 'Call'. Enter call details and save.
Can I record call notes or transcripts?: Yes. After logging a call, you can add notes manually or upload call transcripts if available.
How do I set business hours for support: Navigate to Settings -> Support -> Business Hours and define working hours and holidays.
Can I receive mobile push notifications?: Yes. Install the CRM mobile app and enable push notifications in Settings -> Notifications.
How do I create recurring tasks?: When creating a task, enable the 'Repeat' option and set the frequency (daily, weekly, monthly, etc.).
Can I track customer lifecycle stages?: Yes. Go to Settings -> Lifecycle Stages and define stages like Lead, Prospect, Customer, and Lost.
How do I add tags to contacts or deals?: Open a contact or deal and use the 'Tags' field to add or create new tags.
Can I restrict access to sensitive field: Yes. Go to Settings -> Roles & Permissions and set field-level security for specific user roles.
How do I set up two-factor authenticatio: Go to Settings -> Security -> Two-Factor Authentication and enable it. You can use SMS or authenticator apps.
Can I clone a deal or contact record?: Yes. Open the record and click 'Clone' to duplicate the details into a new entry.
How do I add my company logo to email te: Go to Settings -> Email Templates. Edit a template and use the 'Insert Image' option to upload your logo.
Can I run A/B tests on email campaigns?: Yes. In Campaigns -> Create Email, choose 'A/B Test' and configure variations to test subject lines or content.
How do I integrate LinkedIn with the CRM: Go to Settings -> Integrations -> LinkedIn. Sign in and authorize access to sync leads and messages.
Can I automate deal stage updates?: Yes. Go to Settings -> Automation -> Workflow Rules and create rules to move deals between stages automatically.
How do I create a shared team inbox?: Navigate to Settings -> Communication -> Team Inbox and connect your shared email address.
Can I set priority levels for tasks or t: Yes. While creating or editing a task/ticket, choose a priority level such as Low, Medium, or High.
How do I get notified when a new lead is: Enable lead notifications under Settings -> Notifications or create an automation rule for alerts.
Can I schedule reports to be sent by ema: Yes. Go to Reports -> Schedule Report, choose the frequency, and add recipients.
